data.author: Yuriy Galanter

changelog.release_notes: - Added Pebble 2/Diorite and Timeline Quickview support
- workaround fw 3.6 bug on notification dismissal
- initial update for Pebble Timer & colors
Major update of internal graphics library. Should prevent crashes and result in smoother animation.

- Bluetooth disconnect notification is now a configurable option
- More stability improvments
Attempt to fix elusive crash on notifications (double free)

- added Bluetooth disconnect notification
- styled time tiles with rounded corners

- Larger, more clear font to display time
- Option to swap date and day of the week
Fixed inconsistency with loading settings page
Added configurable options to invert color scheme and show/hide battery indicator.
Fixed crash when switching to a different watchface or displaying a notification when flip-animation is still going.
Added bar with Pebble Battery level on top. Bar is outlined when battery full/discharging and filled when Pebble is charging.
Fix for noon displaying as 12am in 12h mode
Added support for 12h/24h mode depending on watch setting.

data.description:
- Old style flip clock with flip animation and digital date. Both 12h and 24h modes supported (depending on setting of the watch)

- Bar on top displays Pebble Battery level (outlined when full/discharging; filled when charging) can be hidden via options.

- Configurable options: 
     * Show/hide battery level
     * Enable/disable Bluetooth status alert,
     * Swap Date and Day of the week
     * Invert color scheme.

- Future version will include configurable colors

latest_release.release_notes: - Added Pebble 2/Diorite and Timeline Quickview support

data.title: Big Flip Clock
